perturbation.original_text:
INSURANCE

The Company agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, advertising and product liability insurance each with limits no less than $5,000,000 and within thirty (30) days from the date hereof, the Company will submit to Nantz Communications a fully paid policy or certificate of insurance naming Nantz Communications and Nantz as insured parties, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without written notice to Nantz Communications at least twenty (20) days in advance thereof.

The Company further agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, a policy of Directors and Officers Insurance with limits no less than $25,000,000 and within thirty (30) days from the date hereof, the Company will submit to Nantz Communications a fully paid policy or certificate of insurance naming Nantz as an insured party, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without written notice to Nantz Communications at least twenty (20) days in advance hereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
INSURANCE

The Company agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, advertising and product liability insurance each with limits no less than $5,000,000 and within sixty (60) days from the date hereof, the Company will submit to Nantz Communications a fully paid policy or certificate of insurance naming Nantz Communications and Nantz as insured parties, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without written notice to Nantz Communications at least ten (10) days in advance thereof.

The Company further agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, a policy of Directors and Officers Insurance with limits no less than $25,000,000 and within sixty (60) days from the date hereof, the Company will submit to Nantz Communications a fully paid policy or certificate of insurance naming Nantz as an insured party, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without written notice to Nantz Communications at least ten (10) days in advance hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The change extends the period for submitting insurance policies to 60 days, potentially conflicting with requirements for immediate coverage. Reducing the advance notice for policy modification or termination to 10 days does not align with standard insurance practices and could leave the insured parties inadequately protected. Some states require insurance companies to provide longer periods of notice before modifying or terminating policies.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of California Insurance Code sections regarding timely provision of insurance coverage and adequate notice periods for policy changes.

This could lead to premature contract termination, potentially violating the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of California Civil Code sections regarding reasonable time for performance and the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing.

26.  JURISDICTION AND VENUE.  For the purposes of any dispute arising hereunder,
      jurisdiction and venue shall lie in the appropriate court in California.
perturbation.changed_text:
26.  JURISDICTION AND VENUE.  For the purposes of any dispute arising hereunder,
      jurisdiction and venue shall lie solely in a court selected by Ashworth, Inc..
perturbation.explanation: Designating that jurisdiction and venue will solely lie in a court selected by Ashworth, Inc. and without any kind of limitation violates the principles of fairness and impartiality in legal proceedings. California law and the US Constitution require that a jurisdiction/venue selection be unbiased.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of California Rules of Civil Procedure related to jurisdiction and venue, and the Due Process Clause of the US Constitution
